DOC.brief_summary: This 12-week study test safety efficacy asenapine use addition lithium valproate subject acute manic mixed episode Bipolar I Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: 12 Week Study Safety/Efficacy Asenapine When Added Lithium/Valproate Treatment Bipolar Disorder ( A7501008 ) ( COMPLETED ) ( P05844 )
DOC.criteria: Have bipolar I disorder , current episode manic mixed Treated lithium valproic acid Have unstable medical condition Clinically significant laboratory abnormality . Have primary diagnosis bipolar I disorder .
